meanings.definition: A person who has successfully completed a course of study or training.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, the graduates proudly received their diplomas.
meanings.sent2: The graduates gathered on stage to celebrate their achievements.
meanings.sent3: The graduates threw their caps in the air with joy.
meanings.sent4: The graduates emerged from the university cocoon as educated butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The image of the graduates in their caps and gowns will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: To successfully complete a course of study or training.
meanings.sent1: She graduates from college next month and is excited for the future.
meanings.sent2: The class of students graduates with honors this year.
meanings.sent3: The cake in the oven graduates to a golden brown color.
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, the sky graduates from blue to orange hues.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar graduates into a beautiful butterfly, a symbol of transformation.
